main.name: Alex Muriithi

main.bio: My Name is Alex Maina. I am Software developer and Quality Assurance engineer with experience in desktop application development, web application development, mobile application development, automation testing tools and techniques. I am a team player with an open mind to welcome new ideas, techniques to achieve solutions. I am open to new Opportunities
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me for further details.

Achieved a Mean grade of B

work.title: Software Developer and  IT project manager
work.description: Mapping Clients requirements to system requirement, Designing system architecture of desktop Point of sale application, Coding the POS application backend in Java springboot,Writing Unit tests for the POS applications, Automating tests, Managing project lifecycle from Initiation to closure, Designing projects work breakdown structure between a team of developers, Setting up Github version control for projects,Deploying prototypes as Docker Containers.

work.title: IT Intern
work.description: LAN management, ERP System trainer,Regularly updating of computer software for company staff, Managing all IT hardware of the organization (installation, set up and maintenance), Planning for upgrades and software changes to increase efficiency, In charge of domain and email registration as was required by the company, Assisting in computer repairs and troubleshooting, Assisting ICT head in troubleshooting database related problems

testimonials.text: Alex is a brillant software developer and a great team player.
Alex may be fresh from University and have little on job experience, but am confident he will make it to top of your best developers in no time..
